name: topCoins
description: Get top DeFi protocols ranked by TVL with market data, category breakdown, and trend analysis. Filter by chain (Base, Ethereum, etc.) or category (DEX, Lending, etc.).

limit.description: Number of protocols to return (1-50). Default: 10

topProtocols.description: Array of top protocols with name, symbol, TVL, mcap, changes, and trend

summary.description: Total protocols, total TVL, average 1d change, chain/category filters

categoryBreakdown.description: TVL breakdown by category with percentages
